name: Arnold Cohen
description:
"Some nitwit put two dunnies in here!" â€” Michael J. "Crocodile" Dundee

Arnold Cohen had a dream. It was a simple dream, but, nonetheless, a driving force in his life.

The American home was missing something. A key item that was ubiquitous in other countries. So Arnold Cohen set out to fix that. He started a business to sell and distribute this rather important item.

The bidet. From 1964 on, Arnold (or, as he called himself, Mr. Bidet) made it a lifelong mission. For 50 years, he tried to bring the bidet to every American home.

Did he succeed? Well, look in your bathroom. Does it have two dunnies in there?

Clearly, Crocodile Dundee would not be confused...
